title: Cheap TV deal at Best Buy: this 75-inch 4K TV is on sale for just $699.99
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Score a cheap TV deal from Best Buy today
article: If you're looking to snag a cheap TV deal, then you're in luck. We're rounding up the best bargains from Best Buy, and we've spotted this Hisense 75-inch 4K smart TV on sale for just $699.99 (was $799.99). That's a $100 discount and an incredible price for a big-screen 4K TV packed with premium features.

While this Hisense set might not be the best TV in the world, it does feature 4K HD resolution and DTS Virtual X technology for a cinema-like picture experience with bold, bright colors and an immersive audio experience. The big-screen TV also has smart capabilities, so you can enjoy your favorite movies and TV shows from apps like Netflix, Hulu, Disney Plus, and more. You're also getting a handy voice remote, and the Google Assistant built in so you can control your TV and compatible smart home devices completely hands-free. As we've mentioned above, this is the best deal we've found for the Hisense set and a fantastic price for a big-screen 4K TV. We don't know how long Best Buy will have this 4K TV on sale, so you should take advantage now before it's too late.
